name: growtopia.js
description: A package to create a growtopia private servers.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:ts
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run build:ts && node test/index.js
scripts.dev:nonative: rimraf dist && npm run build:ts && node test/index.js
scripts.install: npm run build && npm run build:ts
